Desc.entry: Large indoor climbing centre catering for all abilities with over 1000sqm of climbing walls. Instruction available for children and adults. Equipment hire also available. Also has an on site cafe and CragX climbing shop. Regular clubs for children and adults offering instruction in indoor climbing. These include Spider Club (aged 7-13 years), Young Climbers Club (aged 13-17 years), Adult Club (aged 18 years and over). Also has the Foundry Academy to support young climbers in Sheffield. One-off taster sessions are available for all ages.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 10am-10pm, Sat & Sun 10am-8pm, Wed 7.30-9.30pm (Adult Club), Thurs 7-9pm (Young Climbers Club), Sat & Sun 10.30am-12.30pm (Spider Club), opening times can vary according to the time of year
